content: HAS-E-55 Anchor rod High-performance anchor rod for injectable adhesive capsules (carbon steel, ASTM F1554 grade 55, zinc-plated) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Chisel-tip anchor rod for use with HVU adhesive capsules and for easy insertion when using with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar Head marking for easy verification of steel grade and rod length, even after installation Free of oil and other contamination for the highest performance with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar systems Custom lengths and additional diameters up to 2 available upon request Large range of anchor rod diameters (3/8 - 1-1/4) Applications Suitable for ductile fastening points with predictable steel failure in seismic-relevant applications Suitable for fastenings in concrete and other base materials in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortars Suitable for fastenings in concrete with Hilti HVU capsules For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2198013 -
